snippet.title: Bounce Tales 64 (Release & Download)
snippet.description:
My first hack, and an indeed celebration of the 10th anniversary of the original game.

This hack is CONSOLE COMPATIBLE, so you can play it on your Everdrive 64 or 64drive, and needs the expansion pak.

This should work on most emulators besides PJ64 (remember to set to 8MB the memory) and it also works fine with accurate plugins (GlideN64 & Angrylion)

Download:
BPS:

http://www.mediafire.com/file/0geh4pt971ttw9u/Bounce_Tales_64_1.0fix.bps/file

Z64:

http://www.mediafire.com/file/0p7l74ccvoqua7r/Bounce_Tales_z64.zip/file

Fixes:
- Fixed death warp in final bowser
- Fixed "End Cake" Level warp
- Fixed begin stuck sometimes in the spring in Bonus Level 1
- Changed the MC Lava texture

BTW, this hack has 39 stars, enjoy!!!

Social Media:
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/AloXado320
Twitter: https://twitter.com/AloXado320
Discord Server: https://discord.gg/KHU9YHw
Enjoy the video!
